p.salute: Dear representatives of the Ministry of Education,

p.s: I was astounded to hear about the decision to take off Shakespeare's sonnets of the English school curriculum.
I as a student who is attending his final school year and therefore having thoroughly dealt with and investigated ShakespearesShakespeare's work, disaprovedisapprove of the new curriculum.
I am sure that many of my classmates and parents of upcoming students share the same interest.
Shakespeare is not only of cultural importance but bears way more potential, which was probably overseen by the administrators who are reponsible for the English school curriculum.
This decision is not fair towards students who are exited to attend the English advanced class in the future.
They will be missing out on everything the English language builds on, if not even getting the foundation of cultural English pulled away from under their feet.
Shakespeare is where real English poetry derived from.

Shakespeare is undeniably a milestone in English history, which we, as a culture which depends on and likes to uphold historical events in form of holidays, have basically no other choice than to impementimplement Shakespeare's sonnets in class.
They are more than just texts with arranged words.
They are a part of the worldsworld's story which cannot be forgotten about, not even in Germany.
Imagine the chaos German schools would have to endure if Lessing or Goethe would be fereed out of the curriculum.
The sonnets are not only of cultural value.
They strengthen and train complex understanding skills and fuel creativeness in the heart of every student.
Shakespeare's sonnets contain more facets of the English language than regular English nowadays, resulting in a broader need for deeper investigation and sometimes help from teachers or the internet.

Trying to resolve these missunderstandingsmisunderstandings of complex verse-structures trains a studentsstudent's logical train of thought and his intelectualintellectual strength, making it easier for him to learn new languages with similarly complex sentence structures.
I hope you see that my message is of great importance.
I am sure that I was not the only one complaining about these changes, so please take out requests into account and review them thoroughly.
If there is an important reason why you decided to implement this change, I would appeciateappreciate your standpoint on this matter.
